definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Do I why the absence for give up the reputation credit and riches of doing the regal concubine as a maidservant.
sentences.chinese: 我何必爲一個婢女放棄做妃子的榮華富貴呢。

sentences.english: We were told later that this was the Young Empress, wife of the Emperor Kwang Hsu.
sentences.chinese: 後來我們才知道她是光緒皇帝的妃子，很年輕的皇后。

sentences.english: He once presented litchis from here as a tribute to Emperor Tang Xuanzong's concubine, Yang Guifei.
sentences.chinese: 他曾經把這裏的荔枝進貢給唐玄宗的妃子楊貴妃喫。

sentences.english: When did the story about Smiling Concubine happen?
sentences.chinese: “妃子笑”的故事發生在什麼時候？

sentences.english: These were gifts for the emperor's concubines .
sentences.chinese: 它們都是皇上妃子們的禮物。

sentences.english: White hairs ghosts in front of the show face to suck the blood of his concubine.
sentences.chinese: 白毛鬼當着顯祖的面吸他妃子的血。

sentences.english: The king had four wives and twenty concubines.
sentences.chinese: 這個國王有四個妻子和二十個妃子。

sentences.english: "I have found my princess, " the prince says.
sentences.chinese: 我已經找到我的妃子了，”王子說。

sentences.english: Was a beautiful woman, one of the king's harem.
sentences.chinese: 有一個漂亮的女人，是國王的後宮妃子之一。

sentences.english: This is the hot spring bathing pool Li Longji gave his concubine Yang Yuhuan.
sentences.chinese: 這就是李隆基送給妃子楊玉環的溫泉浴池。
